txt.en: 'The Ruthless Dead are growing in number, I do not know how. I'm not sure if there are some who were hiding in the deeper caves, or some who have abandoned Aragorn's army and returned to the Paths of the Dead.\n\n'They are concentrating in Kêr Bras. Head there and quiet as many as you can. Kêr Bras is within the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of here.'
Avordur is in Dol Amroth, far to the south of the Paths of the Dead.\n\nAvordur will be pleased you quieted many Ruthless Dead within Kêr Bras.
Quiet Ruthless Dead at Kêr Bras ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Ruthless Dead are concentrating their forces at Kêr Bras within of the Paths of the Dead.
'They will arise again, they always do. But we have bought ourselves some more time.'
Ruthless Dead are at Kêr Bras, within the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nAvordur asked you to quiet as many Ruthless Dead within Kêr Bras as you can manage.
Quieted Ruthless Dead at Kêr Bras ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
